recipe.title: Sautéed Oyster Mushrooms
ingredients: 1 pound small oyster mushrooms (any large ones cut into 1-inch pieces), stems trimmed
instructions: Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat until hot. Sauté mushrooms with 1/2 teaspoon salt until golden, about 8 minutes. Add vinegar and sauté until evaporated, about 1 minute. Season with salt, then transfer to a plate to cool. Serve at room temperature.
